name: Sales Tax
description: All citizen pay a sales tax of 15% on selling goods.

properties.Title: SetSalesTax
properties.UserDescription:
Calculate sales tax on every sale excluding landclaim papers
Exclude the sales for the owners of the government plots in that plot (ex Prime Minister doesn't pay sales tax for sales in Prime Minister Office, they do pay sales tax selling to University)

Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.
